measured_by: Robber task (active-avoidance decision task) / Factory task (active-avoidance decision task)
justification: “Building on this method, in the current study, we employed two different tasks with the aim of quantifying priors… In one of the tasks, referred to as the robber task… In the other task, referred to as the factory task… This structure enables us to test whether participants construct a common generalised prior for action outcome contingencies.”
construct: Prior belief about probability of success / Expectation of controllability / Pessimistic/optimistic prior

measured_by: Positive and Negative Affect Schedule – Positive Affect subscale (PANAS-P)
justification: “To test for convergent validity we collected data on participants' self-rated positive affect, as assessed by the Positive and Negative affect schedule.”
“…and trait anxiety, as assessed by State-Trait Anxiety Index-Trait (STAI-T)…Trait anxiety scores correlate with depression in non-clinical samples.”
